card.text:
[Action] Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: Put 1 card [Multi Ener] from your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Twisted Dance of Flame Destruction
card.text: Crush 1 card in your Life Cloth. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 8000 power or lower.

card.name: Doubling Lament
card.text:
Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 5000 power or lower and 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 or higher.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 5000 power or lower. Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.

card.name: Code Art DEF
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text: [Action] {Down}: Banish 1 of your opponent's frozen level 3 or lower SIGNI.

card.name: Code Art RPG
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While your opponent has a frozen SIGNI on their field, this SIGNI's power becomes 10000.

card.name: Flourine, Natural Source
card.type: SIGNI - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While you have 3 Atom SIGNI on your field, all SIGNI on your field get +2000 power.

card.name: Chlorine, Natural Source
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When this SIGNI is banished, you may pay {U}. If you do, search your deck for a card named "Flourine, Natural Source", reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Code Art SML
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text: [Constant]: When the SIGNI in front of this SIGNI attacks, freeze that SIGNI. (It doesn't up during its user's next up phase.)

card.name: PRECIOUS
card.text: Draw 5 cards, then discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: ATTRACTION
card.text: Search your deck for 1 SPELL with total cost 1, 1 SPELL with total cost 2, and 1 SPELL with total cost 3, reveal them, then add them to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Tosa, Phantom Beast
card.text:
[Constant]: All other Sky Beast and Earth Beast SIGNI on your field get +2000 power.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 Sky Beast or Earth Beast SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Beagle, Phantom Beast
card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Earth Beast - Midoriko Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While this has [Lancer], this SIGNI's power becomes 10000. [Action] {G}{G}{G}: This SIGNI gets [Lancer] until end of turn.

card.name: Surrelis, Unresolved Deviation
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Beautiful Technique - Anne Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While there are 3 Beautiful Technique SIGNI on your field, all SIGNI on your field get +2000 power.

card.name: Chihuahuan, Phantom Beast
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Living Spirit: Earth Beast - Midoriko Limited
card.text:
[Action] {1}{G}{G}: Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or higher.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Puri, Innocuous Match
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Beautiful Technique - Anne Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When this SIGNI is banished, you may pay {G}. If you do, search your deck for a card named "Surrelis, Unresolved Deviation", reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Inactivity
card.text:
Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a SIGNI. Put that SIGNI onto your field and put the rest of the cards into the trash. Repeat this process twice.
[Life Burst]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 of those cards to your hand, then put the rest into the trash.

card.name: Angry Roar
card.text: 1 of your Sky Beast or Earth Beast SIGNI gets +2000 power until end of turn. If you have 3 Sky Beast or Earth Beast SIGNI on your field, that SIGNI also gets [Lancer] and "When this SIGNI crushes a card(s) in your opponent's Life Cloth, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone." until end of turn.

card.name: Oriens, Fallen Transgression
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Devil - Urith Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: While a [Charm] is attached to this SIGNI, this SIGNI's power becomes 12000. [Action] {Down}: You may attach the top card of your deck to 1 SIGNI on your field as a [Charm]. (Attaching a [Charm] to a SIGNI is done by placing the [Charm] facedown under that SIGNI. A SIGNI can only have 1 [Charm] attached at a time. When a SIGNI with a [Charm] attached leaves the field, put its [Charm] into the trash.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Maymon, Fallen Confession
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Devil - Urith Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While a [Charm] is attached to this SIGNI, this SIGNI's power becomes 10000.

card.name: Zwei=Sarina
card.text: [Constant]: During your opponent's turn, if this SIGNI battles your opponent's level 2 or lower SIGNI, banish that SIGNI after the battle. (This effect activates even if this SIGNI is banished by that battle.)

card.name: Ein=Dagger
card.text:
[Action] Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -1000 power multiplied by your LRIG's level until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Ariton, Fallen Annihilation
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Devil - Urith Limited
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand or deck into the trash, you may attach this card to 1 SIGNI on your field as a [Charm]. (Attaching a [Charm] to a SIGNI is done by placing the [Charm] facedown under that SIGNI. A SIGNI can only have 1 [Charm] attached at a time. When a SIGNI with a [Charm] attached leaves the field, put its [Charm] into the trash.)

card.name: Evil's Soul
card.text: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -1000 power multiplied by the total combined level of all Devil SIGNI on your field. Then you may attach this card to 1 of your Devil SIGNI as a [Charm]. (Attaching a [Charm] to a SIGNI is done by placing the [Charm] facedown under that SIGNI. A SIGNI can only have 1 [Charm] attached at a time. When a SIGNI with a [Charm] attached leaves the field, put its [Charm] into the trash.)

card.name: End Slash
card.text:
Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Growing Future
card.text:
Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Mayu, Genesis Miko
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this LRIG unless you reveal 1 Tama or Iona LRIG from your LRIG Deck and put it under your LRIG
[Enter]: Put all LRIGs from your LRIG Trash under this card and return all white and black ARTS from your LRIG Trash to your LRIG deck. [Action] {Exceed 1}: All SIGNI on your opponent's field lose all their abilities until end of turn. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Put all cards from your Ener Zone into the trash and discard all cards in your hand. Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Hanayo Five
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Hanayo" in its card name.
[Constant]: This LRIG has the [Action] abilities of all LRIGs in your LRIG Trash. [Constant]: All SIGNI on your field get [Double Crush]. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Banish any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field whose total combined power is 30000 or lower.

card.name: Code Piruluk ACRO
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Piruluk" in its card name.
[Constant]: This LRIG has the [Action] abilities of all LRIGs in your LRIG Trash. [Enter]: Your opponent discards all cards in their hand. [Action] {Exceed 5}: If you have 6 cards or less in your hand, draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

card.name: Midoriko, Type Five
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Midoriko" in its card name.
[Constant]: This LRIG has the [Action] abilities of all LRIGs in your LRIG Trash. [Enter]: Add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Each player puts all colored cards from their Ener Zone into the trash.

card.name: Tamayorihime, Sunspot Miko
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless you have 10 or more black cards in your trash.
[Constant]: All SIGNI in each players' zones except for their Ener Zones become black. [Action] {B}, Put 1 black card from your Ener Zone into the trash: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 5}: Down your opponent's LRIG and all SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Urith, Enma of Nothingness
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless there are 3 or more colors among the cards in your Ener Zone.
[Constant]: All cards in your Ener Zone get [Multi Ener]. [Constant]: Ignore the limiting conditions of all of your ARTS and SPELLs. [Action] {Exceed 5}: Choose 1 card from your hand. Your opponent declares 1 color, including colorless. Reveal your chosen card, and if that card's color does not match your opponent's declaration, put all SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Last Select
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Put 4 cards from under your LRIG into the LRIG Trash. If you do, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Yuzuki Five
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Yuzuki" in its card name.
[Enter]: Put up to 3 cards from your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Put 1 card from your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash. [Action] {Exceed 2}: You may use 1 red SPELL from your hand without paying its cost.

card.name: Lit Situation
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Down 1 upped Dragon Beast SIGNI on your field. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power lower than or equal to the power of the SIGNI downed this way.

card.name: Eldora=Mark V
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Eldora" in its card name.
[Enter]: Look at all cards in your Life Cloth. Put any number of them into the trash, then add that many cards from the top of your deck to your Life Cloth. Then look at all cards in your Life Cloth and rearrange them in any order. [Action] {Exceed 2}: Crush 1 card in your Life Cloth. If you do, add 1 card from your hand to your Life Cloth.

card.name: Milulun Tico
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Milulun" in its card name.
[Constant]: Your opponent cannot use SPELLs. [Action] {Exceed 1}: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the bottom of your deck in any order, then put the rest on top of your deck in any order. [Action] {Exceed 2}: You may use 1 SPELL from your opponent's trash without paying its cost, ignoring its limiting conditions.

card.name: Fortune Five
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. If you revealed 3 or more Atom SIGNI this way, down and freeze 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. If you revealed 4 or more, draw a card. If you revealed 5, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Then, put all of the revealed cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Anne Fifth, Violating God Seal
card.text:
(Grow): You cannot grow into this card unless your LRIG has "Anne" in its card name.
[Enter]: Add up to 3 Beautiful Technique SIGNI from your trash to your hand. [Action] {Exceed 2}: Disable the attacks from 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Use this ability only when a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks. [Action] {Exceed 3}: Reveal all cards in your hand. If you revealed 8 or more Beautiful Technique SIGNI with different names this way, return all SIGNI on your opponent's field to their owner's hand.

card.name: Different Strokes
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
All Beautiful Technique SIGNI on your field are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's SIGNI and SPELLs until end of turn. (This effect also affects SIGNI that are put onto your field after this ARTS's resolution.)

card.name: Hate Impress
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Put 1 of your Poison Fang SIGNI from your field into the trash. If you do, all SIGNI on your opponent's field get -2000 power multiplied by the level of the SIGNI put into the trash this way until end of turn,.

card.name: End Hole
card.text:
Use Timing [Spell Cut-In]
If you paid {W}{R}{U}{G}{B} for this ARTS's cost, end the turn. (At the time the turn ends due to an effect or rules, put all cards in the Check Zones into the trash. If the turn player has more cards in their hand than their maximum hand size, they discard cards from their hand until the number of cards in their hand becomes equal to their maximum hand size. All "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: Lucky Guard
card.text:
Use Timing [Spell Cut-In]
1 SIGNI on your field gets "This SIGNI cannot be banished." until end of turn.

card.name: Arc Energe, Original Spear
card.type: SIGNI|LB - War Spirit: Arm - Tama Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: Your opponent skips their ener phase. [Constant]: While there is an "Energe, Original Spear" on your field, when a SIGNI on your opponent's field would be banished, put it into the trash instead of the Ener Zone. [Enter] {W}{W}{W}: Search your deck for up to 2 Arm SIGNI and put them onto your field. Then shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 card, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Code Labyrinth Louvre
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: The SIGNI in front of this SIGNI loses its abilities. [Constant]: While there are 2 or more SIGNI with no abilities on your opponent's field, this SIGNI gets +3000 power. [Auto]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field is put from the field into its owner's deck, search your deck for 1 Labyrinth SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: All SIGNI on your opponent's field lose their abilities during your next turn. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Diabride, Natural Pyroxene
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Nature Spirit: Gem - Hanayo Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: Once per turn, when this SIGNI has crushed 2 or more cards in a Life Cloth in the same turn, up this SIGNI. [Constant]: Once per turn, when 1 of your Ore or Gem SIGNI becomes affected by the effects of your opponent's ARTS, damage your opponent.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or lower. If you have 2 or less cards in your Life Cloth, crush 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.

card.name: Mušḫuššu, Phantom Dragon Princess
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Living Spirit: Dragon Beast - Yuzuki Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: While this SIGNI's power is 20000 or higher, this SIGNI gets [Double Crush] and "When this SIGNI attacks, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field." [Auto]: When a card is put from your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash by your card's effect, this SIGNI gets +4000 power until end of turn. [Action] {R}{R}{R}: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 or lower.
[Life Burst]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Dragon Beast SIGNI, draw 2 cards. Otherwise, draw 1 card.

card.name: Code Love Heart CMR
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: Your opponent cannot draw cards or add cards to their hand during their turn except during their draw phase and grow phase. [Action] [1/Turn] Discard all cards in your hand: If you discarded 2 or more cards from your hand to use this ability, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Down and freeze your opponent's LRIG.

card.name: Uranium, Natural Source
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: This SIGNI cannot attack. [Constant]: This SIGNI gets +2000 power for each card under it. [Enter]: Put 3 Atom SIGNI other than "Uranium, Natural Source" from your trash under this SIGNI. If you do not, put this SIGNI into the trash. [Action] {Down}: Add 1 card from under this SIGNI to your hand. Then if there are no cards under this SIGNI, banish this SIGNI and 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 SPELL and 1 Atom SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Lion, Phantom Beast Deity
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Living Spirit: Earth Beast - Midoriko Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: This SIGNI's power cannot be changed by your opponent's card abilities. [Constant]: All SIGNI on your field with 15000 power or higher are unaffected by the abilities of your opponent's SIGNI and SPELLs.
[Life Burst]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone and banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or higher.

card.name: Suiboku, Single Stroke Worthy of Nobility
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Beautiful Technique - Anne Limited
card.text:
[Auto]: When a Beautiful Technique SIGNI on your field is banished, you may pay {G}{W}. If you do, put that SIGNI from your Ener Zone onto your field. [Auto]: When you [Guard] your opponent's LRIG's attack or disable your opponent's SIGNI's attack by a card's effect, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. Disable the next attack by your opponent's LRIG or SIGNI on your opponent's field during this turn.

card.name: Code Ancients Necronomico
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Ancient Weapon - Iona Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: Once per turn, when an Ancient Weapon SIGNI is put from your trash onto your field, add 1 card from your trash to your hand.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 SIGNI, put it into the trash, and shuffle your deck. Then add 1 card from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Luciferl, Fallen Talented Woman
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Devil - Urith Limited
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI crushes 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −10000 power until end of turn. [Enter] {B}{B}{B}: Put up to 2 level 3 or lower Devil SIGNI from your trash onto your field.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Banish all Angel SIGNI on the field. - Put 1 Devil SIGNI from your trash onto your field or add it to your hand.

card.name: Aphrodite, Flower Bloom of Late Beginnings
card.text: [Constant]: When a SIGNI in front of this SIGNI attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, this SIGNI gets +3000 power until end of turn. [Constant]: When this SIGNI is put onto your field, if it was not put there from your hand, you may pay {W}{W}. If you do, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Gaevolg, Ultimate Spear
card.text: [Action] {W}, {Down}: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. This ability cannot be used unless this SIGNI's power is 12000 or higher.

card.name: Get Grimoire
card.text:
Reveal 1 Arm SIGNI from your hand. Search your deck for up to 3 SIGNI with the same name as the revealed SIGNI, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Discard 1 Arm SIGNI from your hand. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Arm SIGNI, reveal them, then add them to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Avenger, Ballista
card.text:
[Action] Discard 1 Weapon SIGNI from your hand: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 8000 power or lower. [Action] Discard 3 Weapon SIGNI from your hand: Crush 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth. Its [Life Burst] ability does not trigger.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or lower.

card.name: Peridot, Natural Stone
card.text: [Enter]: If you have "Sapphi, Natural Stone" and "Rubyl, Natural Stone" on your field, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 15000 power or lower.

card.name: Most Treasured Fragment
card.text:
This SPELL costs {1} more to use for each card in your Life Cloth. All Ore and Gem SIGNI on your field get [Double Crush] until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: The SIGNI in your center SIGNI Zone gets [Double Crush] until the end of the next turn.

card.name: Jinbei, Water Phantom
card.text:
[Constant]: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, up all Water Beast SIGNI on your field. [Action] Down 3 of your upped Water Beast SIGNI: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.
[Life Burst]: Discard 1 card from your hand, then discard 2 cards from your opponent's hand at random.

card.name: Code Art SPK
card.text: [Enter]: Freeze 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Then if all SIGNI on your opponent's field are frozen, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. (Frozen SIGNI do not up during their user's next up phase.)

card.name: SPIRAL
card.text:
If you have a "Spiral Carmilla, Water Phantom Princess" on your field, the SPELL's cost becomes {U}. If you have 4 or more cards in your hand, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Draw one card, then you may reveal 1 "Spiral Carmilla, Water Phantom Princess" from your hand. If you do, draw 1 more card.

card.name: Sakura, Natural Plant
card.text:
[Constant]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field is banished during your Main Phase, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. [Constant]: When an upped SIGNI on your field is downed by a card's effect, put the top card of your deck into the Ener Zone. (Downing as a cost or by attacking is not treated as by a card's effect.)
[Life Burst]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. Then add up to 1 card from your Ener Zone to your hand.

card.name: Rhino, Phantom Beast
card.text: [Action] {Down}: 1 of your Sky Beast or Earth Beast SIGNI gets [Lancer] until end of turn. (If a SIGNI with [Lancer] banishes 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field by battle, it crushes 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.)

card.name: Increasing Force
card.text:
During this turn's Main Phase, when 1 of your upped Plant SIGNI becomes downed, if it is the third time this turn, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field, add 1 card from your Ener Zone to your hand, then draw 1 card. You can only use this "Increasing Force" effect once per turn.
[Life Burst]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. Then if you have 4 or less cards in your Ener Zone, put the top card of your deck into the Ener Zone again.

card.name: Code Anti Marsface
card.text: [Action] {Down}, Banish 1 of your other Ancient Weapon SIGNI: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -7000 power until end of turn. [Action] {Down}, Put 2 of your other Ancient Weapon SIGNI on your field into the trash: All SIGNI on your opponent's field get -10000 power until end of turn.

card.name: Final Destruction
card.text:
Your LRIG gets "[Action] {Down}: Banish all SIGNI on your opponent's field." until end of turn. At the end of this turn, discard all cards in your hand.
[Life Burst]: Discard all cards in your hand. If you do, banish all SIGNI.

card.name: Code Maze Sagfami
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text:
[Enter] Discard 1 Labyrinth SIGNI from your hand: You may change the SIGNI Zone of any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field. Then draw 1 card.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Lævateinn, Greatsword
card.type: SIGNI - War Spirit: Arm / War Spirit: Weapon
card.text: [Constant]: When this SIGNI battles your opponent's level 4 SIGNI, banish that opponent's SIGNI.

card.name: Code Maze Metron
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While you have 3 Labyrinth SIGNI on your field, all SIGNI on your field get +2000 power.

card.name: Brionac, Medium Spear
card.text: [Action] {1}{W}{W}, Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: Search your deck for up to 2 Arm or Weapon SIGNI, reveal them, then add them to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Code Maze Michel
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text: [Action] {W}{W}{W}, Put this SIGNI from the field into the trash: Shuffle 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower SIGNI into the owner's deck.

card.name: Engetsu, Small Sword
card.text:
[Constant]: When this SIGNI is banished, you may pay {W}. If you do, search your deck for 1 "Brionac, Medium Spear", reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Get Almandal
card.text: Choose up to two: - Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower white SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. - If your LRIG is white and level 4 or higher, search your deck for 1 SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Lintwurm, Phantom Dragon
card.text:
[Constant]: All other Dragon Beast SIGNI on your field get +2000 power.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 Dragon Beast SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Komodo, Phantom Dragon
card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Dragon Beast - Yuzuki Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While your LRIG is level 4 or higher, this SIGNI's power becomes 10000.

card.name: Tokage, Phantom Dragon
card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Dragon Beast - Yuzuki Limited
card.text: [Constant]: This SIGNI gets +1000 power multiplied by the total combined level of all your other Dragon Beast SIGNI on your field.

card.name: Life-Extending Selection
card.text: Choose up to two: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 3000 power or lower. - If your LRIG is red and level 4 or higher, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power 10000 or lower.

card.name: Thorium, Natural Source
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text:
[Enter] Discard 1 Atom SIGNI from your hand: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 Atom SIGNI from among them to your hand, then put the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Actinium, Natural Source
card.type: SIGNI - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text: [Constant]: While your LRIG is level 4 or higher, this SIGNI's power becomes 10000.

card.name: Chromium, Natural Source
card.type: SIGNI - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text: This SIGNI gets +1000 power multiplied by the total combined level of all your other Atom SIGNI on your field.

card.name: RAINY
card.text: Choose up to two: - Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. - If your LRIG is blue and level 4 or higher, draw 3 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Colla, Opposing Methodology
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Beautiful Technique - Anne Limited
card.text:

card.name: Pinch Defense

Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Your opponent's LRIG cannot attack until end of turn. If your LRIG is white and your have 2 or less cards in your Life Cloth, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field also cannot attack until end of turn.

card.text: [Action] {R}, Discard 1 red SIGNI from your hand: 1 red SIGNI on your field gets [Assassin] until end of turn. [Action] {R}, Discard 1 Ore or Gem SIGNI from your hand: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 2}: Draw 3 cards. At the beginning of your next Attack Phase, discard all cards in your hand.

card.name: Code Piruluk Lambda
card.text: [Enter]: Draw 1 card, then your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Draw 2 cards. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 3}: Down and freeze 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. (A frozen SIGNI is not upped during its user's next up phase.)

card.name: Midoriko, Piercing Woman Type Four
card.text: [Enter]: Add up to 3 cards from your Ener Zone to your hand. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. [Action] {Exceed 2}: All SIGNI on your field get [Lancer] until end of turn. (When a SIGNI with [Lancer] banishes an opponent's SIGNI by battle, it crushes 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.)

card.name: Urith, Scorching Enma
card.text: [Enter]: Search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into the trash. Then shuffle your deck. [Action] [1/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Banish 1 Devil SIGNI. If you do, draw 2 cards. [Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: Discard 1 card from your hand. If you do, put 1 Devil SIGNI from your trash onto your field.

card.name: Tamayorihime, Meek Miko
card.text: [Constant]: When this LRIG is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, up 1 SIGNI on your field.

card.name: Yuki, Miko of Regret
card.text: [Constant]: When this LRIG is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, you may change the SIGNI Zone of any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Summon Labyrinth
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower white SIGNI and put it onto the field. Then shuffle your deck. If you have an Iona LRIG, search your deck for 1 level 4 or lower white SIGNI and put it onto your field instead. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Byzant Defense
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack unless you pay {3}." until end of turn. If have a Tama LRIG, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack unless you pay {4}." instead.

(Play Condition) [Attack Phase]: Discard 2 Space SIGNI from your hand.
[Constant]: If this SIGNI is banished, it is put into the LRIG Trash instead of returning to the LRIG Deck. [Enter]: 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack." until end of turn.

card.name: Hanayo Three, Pure Love Fire
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, 1 SIGNI on your field gets [Double Crush] until end of turn.

card.name: Absolute Extinction
card.text:

This ARTS costs {R} less to use if you have a Hanayo LRIG. Discard all cards in your hand, then banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. If you discarded 3 or more cards from your hand this way, banish 1 more SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Code Piruluk Delta
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

card.name: Blue Punish
card.text:

Choose up to two. If you have a Piruluk LRIG, choose up to three instead: - Cancel the effect of 1 SPELL with total cost 5 or less being used. - Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. - Draw 1 card.

card.name: Chain Blue and Black
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Chain] {U}{B} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {U}{B} less to use.) Choose up to two: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -3000 power until end of turn. - Add 1 non-colorless SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Look at your opponent's hand and the top card of your opponent's deck. - Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Midoriko, Sowing Girl Type Three
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.

card.name: Retribution

This ARTS costs {2} less to use multiplied by your LRIG's level. Put all white, red, blue, green, and black cards from your opponent's Ener Zone and all SIGNI on their field into the trash. If you have a Midoriko LRIG, put all cards from your opponent's Ener Zone and all SIGNI on their field into the trash instead.

card.name: Pluralism Depiction
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]:
[Chain] {G}{W} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {G}{W} less to use.) Choose one: - Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn. - If a card in your Life Cloth was crushed by your opponent's card effect this turn, add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. - Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI and put it onto your field. That SIGNI's [Enter] ability is not triggered. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Urith, Three Paths Enma
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, add 1 black SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

If you have a Urith LRIG, choose up to three instead: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -12000 power until end of turn. - Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your trash onto your field. - Add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Each player puts the top 7 cards of their deck into the trash.

card.name: Refresh End
card.text:
Use Timing [Spell Cut-In]
When your opponent refreshes their deck this turn, end the turn. (At the time the turn ends due to an effect or rules, put all cards in the Check Zones into the trash. If the turn player has more cards in their hand than their maximum hand size, they discard cards from their hand until the number of cards in their hand becomes equal to their maximum hand size. All "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

(Play Condition) [Main Phase]: Put a total of 3 Playground Equipment SIGNI from your hand or Ener Zone into the trash.
[Constant]: Once per turn, when this SIGNI attacks, up 1 SIGNI on your field. [Constant]: When a SIGNI on your field is upped, up this SIGNI.

card.name: Tawil=Tre, the Opener
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, your opponent can only have up to 2 SIGNI on their field this turn. (If there are already 3 SIGNI on your opponent's field, your opponent puts SIGNI from their field into the trash until there are 2 SIGNI left.)

card.name: Crystal Break
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Banish 1 frozen SIGNI on your opponent's field. If you have a Remember LRIG, banish 1 more frozen SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: White Maze Hodesapa
card.type: RESONA - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]: Discard 1 white SIGNI and 1 black SIGNI from your hand.
[Constant]: All SIGNI on your opponent's field must attack if able. [Constant]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks, that SIGNI gets −2000 power until end of turn. [Enter]: You may change the SIGNI Zone of any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field, then you may up SIGNI that changed their SIGNI Zone this way.

card.name: Yuzuki Three, Flower Bloom Rebellion
card.text: [Constant]: At the beginning of your grow phase, you may pay {0}. If you do, the [Enter] ability of your LRIGs does not trigger this turn.

card.name: Code Piruluk Phi
card.text: [Enter] {U}: Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. [Enter] {B}: Add 1 black SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Draw Dissolve
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
If there is a blue ARTS in your LRIG Trash, this ARTS costs {1} less to use. If there is a black ARTS in your LRIG Trash, this ARTS costs {1} less to use. Draw cards equal to your LRIG's level. Then all SIGNI on your opponent's field get -2000 power for each card in your hand.

card.name: Arowana Panic
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field on top of its owner's deck. Then if you have an Eldora LRIG, you may crush 1 card in your Life Cloth. If you do, add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth.

card.name: #Tyrazaus#, Green Phantom Dragon
card.type: RESONA - Living Spirit: Dragon Beast - Yuzuki Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Main Phase]: Put 1 red Dragon Beast SIGNI and 1 green Dragon Beast SIGNI from your Ener Zone into the trash.
[Constant]: When this SIGNI leaves the field, search your deck for 1 SIGNI with "Phantom Dragon Princess" in its card name and put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. [Enter]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or lower. [Enter]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 15000 power or lower.

card.name: Umr=Tre, Wielder of the Key of Impartiality
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into the LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, add up to 2 white or black SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Dark Art †MGT†
card.type: RESONA - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Main Phase]: Put 1 non-RESONA blue Electric Machine SIGNI and 1 non-RESONA black Electric Machine SIGNI from your field into the trash.
[Constant]: At the beginning of your opponent's Attack Phase, you may discard 1 SPELL from your hand. If you do, down and freeze 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Enter]: Add 1 blue or black SPELL from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Gabrielt, Future of the True Angel
card.text:
[Constant]: This SIGNI is unaffected by your opponent's non-ARTS card effects. [Constant]: While there are 4 or more ARTS in your LRIG Trash, this SIGNI gets "When this SIGNI attacks, if there are 3 Angel SIGNI on your field, put all SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.".
[Life Burst]: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Flathro Lieutenant General, Crossbow Flame
card.text:
[Enter]: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Add all cards with "Flathro" in their card name from among them to your hand, then put the rest into the trash. [Action] Discard 1 card with "Flathro" in its card name from your hand: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power equal to or lower than the number of cards with "Flathro" in their card names in your trash multiplied by 2000.
[Life Burst]: Add up to 2 SIGNI with "Flathro" in their card names from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Daihouika, Water Phantom Princess
card.text:
[Auto]: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, draw 2 cards. [Auto]: At the end of your turn, discard 1 card from your hand. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. Then 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −6000 power for each card that was discarded this way.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card. Then if there are 4 or less cards in your hand, draw 1 more card.

card.name: #Spazaus#, Phantom Dragon Princess
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Living Spirit: Dragon Beast - Yuzuki Limited

[Action] {1}{G}{R}: Put 1 card from your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash. Use this ability only if your opponent's LRIG is level 4 or higher.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or lower. Then if there are 8 or more cards in your opponent's Ener Zone, your opponent puts cards from their Ener Zone into the trash until there are 7 cards in their Ener Zone.

card.name: Hawk, Phantom Beast

[Constant]: Once per turn, when this SIGNI crushes 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth, you may pay {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}. If you do, damage your opponent.

[Constant]: When a SIGNI is put onto your field from your trash (including this SIGNI), 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -7000 power until end of turn. [Action] [Attack Phase] {B}: Put 1 level 4 or lower Ancient Weapon SIGNI from your trash onto your field..
[Life Burst]: Add up to 2 SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: TORNADO

If the number of cards in your hand is equal to or greater than the number of cards in your opponent's hand, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

[Constant]: The power of all Sky Beast and Earth Beast SIGNI on your field cannot be changed by your opponent's card effects.

Shuffle any number of Atom SIGNI with different names from your trash into your deck. Then banish any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field whose total combined level is lower than or equal to the number of SIGNI shuffled into your deck this way.

This ARTS costs {2} less to use for each ARTS in your LRIG Trash. Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -2000 power until end of turn.

If red was a chosen color, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power 10000 or lower. If blue was a chosen color, draw 1 card. If green was a chosen color, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power 12000 or higher.

(Since colorless is not a color, if the colors among SIGNI on your field are white, colorless, and colorless, this ability is active.)

card.text: Choose one: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI with 8000 power or lower. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, put 1 card with [Multi Ener] in your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash.

Then choose one for each card put into the LRIG Trash this way: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field loses all abilities until end of turn. - Draw 1 card. - Put the top card of your deck into the Ener Zone. - Each player puts the top 4 cards of their deck into the trash.

Banish all SIGNI on your opponent's field.

[Action] {Exceed 1}: Up 1 Poison Fang SIGNI on your field. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 3}: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of Poison Fang SIGNI from among them onto your field, then put the rest into the trash.

card.name: Ice Flame Shoot
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Choose up to four. This ARTS costs {2} more to use for each option chosen beyond the second: - Down 1 of your opponent's LRIGs. - Freeze 1 of your opponent's LRIGs. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 7000 power or lower. - Banish 1 non-RESONA SIGNI on your opponent's field. Discard 1 card from your hand.

This ARTS's cost becomes {3}{G}{B} during your opponent's turn. Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Then put cards from the top of your deck into your Ener Zone equal to that SIGNI's level.

[Enter]: All SIGNI on your opponent's field with a [Charm] attached get −10000 power until end of turn.

card.type: RESONA - Living Spirit: Misfortune Insect - Myu Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Spell Cut-In]: Put a total of 2 non-RESONA Misfortune Insect SIGNI from your hand, Ener Zone, and/or field into the trash.

card.name: Sashe Lune, Benevolent Messenger
card.text: [Constant]: Your opponent may only use 1 ARTS per turn. [Action] [1/Turn] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: Return 1 SIGNI on your field to its owner's hand. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Put any number of Space RESONAs from your LRIG Deck onto your field, ignoring their (Play Condition).

card.name: Sashe Quartier, Benevolent Messenger
card.text: [Enter]: Put 1 white SIGNI from your trash onto your field. At the end of your turn, put that SIGNI from the field into the trash.

card.name: Xeno Entrance
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
[Encore] {W} (You may an additional {W} as you use this ARTS. If you do, this ARTS gets "Return this ARTS to the LRIG Deck.") Search your deck for 1 white SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Standing Flame Cross
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose one: - Search your deck for all SIGNI with card names that are listed on the (Cross) condition of SIGNI on your field then put them onto your field 1 at a time. Then shuffle your deck. - If there are crossed SIGNI on your field, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Three Burning Gathered Steps
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Banish exactly 3 SIGNI with the same power as each other.

card.name: Under One
card.text:

[Constant]: When a SIGNI on your field with "Flathro" in its card name leaves the field, you may put 1 SIGNI with "Flathro" in its card name and a lower level than that SIGNI from your hand onto your field downed. [Action] [2/Turn] {Exceed 1}: Add 1 SIGNI with "Flathro" in its card name from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Yuzuki Two, the Convicted
card.text: [Constant]: When this LRIG attacks, if there is a red SIGNI and a green SIGNI on your field, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Flame Gained, Fire Lost
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose one: - Draw 4 cards, then exclude 2 cards in your hand from the game at random. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Your opponent draws 1 card, then puts the top card of their deck into their Ener Zone.

card.name: Flame Army Struggle
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 SIGNI with "Flathro" in their card name and put them onto your field. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Code Piruluk Pi
card.text: [Constant]: When this LRIG attacks, if there is a blue SIGNI and a black SIGNI on your field, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Steel Spell Run
Midoriko, Harmonious Girl Type Three
card.text: [Enter]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone for each Plant SIGNI on your field.

card.name: Laborious Work
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Encore] Discard 1 Beautiful Technique SIGNI from your hand. (You may discard 1 Beautiful Technique SIGNI from your hand as you use this ARTS. If you do, this ARTS gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Yggdra, Green Natural Plant
card.type: RESONA - Nature Spirit: Plant - Midoriko Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Main Phase]: Put 2 non-RESONA Plant SIGNI from your field into the trash.
[Constant]: All non-colorless cards in your Ener Zone have all colors. [Constant]: You cannot put colorless SIGNI onto the field, and you cannot use colorless spells. (Colorless SIGNI that are already on your field are put into the trash.)

card.name: Iona, Ancient/Maiden
card.text: [Constant]: SIGNI on your opponent's field must attack if able. [Auto]: When a SIGNI is put from your trash onto your field, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -5000 power until end of turn. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: Put the top 5 cards of your deck into the trash. [Action] {Exceed 2}: During your opponent's next turn, when a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks, banish that SIGNI after its attack ends.

card.name: Hanare, Dark One of Causing Trouble
card.text: [Constant]: When this card is put into your LRIG Trash to pay for an {Exceed} cost, put 1 level 3 or lower Poison Fang SIGNI from your trash onto your field.

card.name: Curse of Spell
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
Exclude all SPELLs in your opponent's trash from the game. Then if you excluded 3 or more SPELLs from the game this way, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Crisis Chance
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
If there are 0 cards in your hand, add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand. If there are 0 cards in your Ener Zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into the Ener Zone. If there are no SIGNI on your field, put 1 SIGNI from your hand onto the field.

card.name: Code Castle Versa
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Labyrinth - Iona Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: The [Enter] abilities of your SIGNI put onto your opponent's field do not trigger. [Constant]: SIGNI on your opponent's field cannot gain new abilities by your opponent's effects. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {W}: Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with no abilities to its owner's hand.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field on the bottom of their deck.

card.name: ⁑Mouth⁑, Holy Shield of Truth
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Beautiful Technique - Anne Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: While there are 2 or more green Beautiful Technique SIGNI on your field, this SIGNI's power becomes 12000. [Constant]: When a Beautiful Technique SIGNI is put from a non-hand zone onto your field (including this SIGNI), you may pay {W}. If you do, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 Beautiful Technique SIGNI, then either add it to your hand, put it in your Ener Zone, or put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Flathro General, Attacking Crossbow Flame
card.type: SIGNI|LB - War Spirit: Weapon - Hanayo Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When a SIGNI is put onto your opponent's field during your turn, if that SIGNI's power is 8000 power or lower, banish it. [Enter] {R}{R}{R}: If there are 3 SIGNI with "Flathro" in their card name on your field, banish all SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. If there are 10 or more SIGNI with "Flathro" in their card name in your trash, crush 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.

card.name: Suikaline, Natural Stone
card.text:
[Constant]: If this SIGNI would be banished during your opponent's turn, you may crush 1 card in your Life Cloth instead. [Enter]: Discard 1 card from your hand. If you discarded an Ore or Gem SIGNI from your hand this way and your LRIG is red, this SIGNI gets [Assassin] until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card, then you may crush 1 card in your Life Cloth. If you do, draw 1 more card.

card.name: Beryllium, Natural Source Princess
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Nature Spirit: Atom - Milulun Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When an Atom SIGNI leaves your field by your opponent's card effect, discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. [Constant]: When you use an opponent's SPELL, either banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field or your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. [Enter] {U}: You may use 1 SPELL from your opponent's trash by paying its cost. (Limiting conditions are not ignored.)
[Life Burst]: Look at your opponent's hand. Choose 1 card from it, then discard it.

card.name: Baobaboon, Natural Plant Flower Princess

[Enter]: Search your deck for 1 non-green level 5 SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] Exclude this card in your hand from the game: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 2 cards with different colors and put them into your Ener Zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Wasli, Third Play
card.type: SIGNI|LB - War Spirit: Playground Equipment - Aiyai Limited
card.text:
[Constant]: When a card is added from your Ener Zone to your hand, you may banish this SIGNI. If you do, you may put 1 SIGNI from your Ener Zone onto your field downed. [Constant]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand or deck into the trash, if you have an Aiyai LRIG, put this SIGNI from your trash into your Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. Then if that card was a Playground Equipment SIGNI, draw 1 card.

card.name: Code Love Heart †MCMR†
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited
card.text:
[Action] [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In] {0}: Shuffle 4 non-colorless SIGNI with different levels from your trash into your deck. If you do, choose one: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field - Cancel the effect of 1 SPELL being used. - Put 1 level 4 or lower Electric Machine SIGNI from your trash onto your field.
[Life Burst]: Down and freeze 1 of your opponent's LRIGs.

card.name: †Arcgain†, Archangel of a Thousand Sufferings
card.text:

[Action] [1/Turn] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {B}: Banish 1 other Angel SIGNI on your field. If you do, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -3000 power until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 white card and 1 black card from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Servant ∞

[Constant]: [Multi Ener] [Enter]: Choose 1 of the following zones: main deck, hand, SIGNI Zone, or trash. [Constant]: All SIGNI in your opponent's chosen zone from this SIGNI's [Enter] ability lose all classes and colors and become Origin Spirit SIGNI.
[Life Burst]: Add up to 2 SIGNI with [Guard] from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Kakushi, Large Fist

card.name: Advancing Flame Army
card.text: Choose one: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your field with "Flathro" in its card name. Add 1 SIGNI with "Flathro" in its card name from among them to your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

(If there are 2 or less cards, reveal all of them.)

Reveal the top card of your deck. If your opponent declared wrong, that LRIG's attack does not damage you."

card.name: Mel=Martini

Put a card with (Accessory) from among them into your Ener Zone, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. [Action] ((Berserk)) Pay 3 Coins: During your opponent's next turn, your opponent cannot use ARTS, SPELLs, or [Action] abilities, and SIGNI on their field must attack if able.

(SIGNI with [Shadow] cannot be chosen by their opponent's card effects.)

card.name: Finishing Touches on the Fire Dragon
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Search your deck for 1 SIGNI with (Rise), put it onto your field, then shuffle your deck. That SIGNI's [Enter] abilities are not triggered. Then banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power equal to or lower than the power of the SIGNI put onto the field this way. If you bet, banish all SIGNI on your opponent's field with power equal to or lower than the power of the SIGNI put onto the field this way instead.

card.name: Painful Separation from Loved Ones
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
This ARTS cannot be used unless it is during your opponent's turn. [Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 coin as you use this ARTS.) When a SIGNI on your field is banished this turn, if it was not by your own card effect, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field, then if you bet, additionally add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth.

card.name: Ril, Memory of Mutual Favor
card.text: [Enter]: Get 1 Coin.

All Valor SIGNI on your field get "Once per turn, if this SIGNI would be banished, it is not banished." until end of turn.

card.name: Flame-Awned Flash
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Banish all SIGNI on your opponent's field with 1000 power or lower.

card.name: Powerful Aya! I
card.text: [Enter] Discard 1 card from your hand: Get 1 Coin.

card.name: Task Draw
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 2 Coins (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Draw 2 cards. If you bet, draw 4 cards instead.

card.name: Slip Knot
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Your LRIG gets "When a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into the trash. If the card that was put into the trash this way has [Life Burst], disable that attack." until end of turn.

card.name: Trip Trap
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Flip 1 Trap on your field face-up then trigger its Trap ability if any. (Put that Trap into the trash afterwards.)

card.name: Mel=Kahlua
card.text: [Enter] Discard 1 card from your hand: You get 1 Coin.

card.name: Thundering Earthenware
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 Coin as you use this ARTS.) Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 15000 power or higher. If you bet, banish 1 more SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or higher.

card.name: Adapting to Changed Circumstances
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Search your deck for 1 SIGNI with (Accessory) and put it into the Ener Zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Nanashi, That One Remodeled
card.text: [Enter] Discard 1 card from your hand: Get 1 Coin.

card.name: Bio Hazard

card.name: Spread Death
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -7000 power until end of turn. If that SIGNI is infected, it gets -12000 power instead. (A SIGNI on the same SIGNI Zone as a [Virus] is infected.)

card.name: Abnormal Lover
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
Remove any number of [Virus]es from your opponent's field. Then add 1 black SIGNI from your trash to your hand for each [Virus] removed this way.

card.name: More Coin Salvage
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
[Bet]: 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Add 1 SIGNI that shares a color with your LRIG from your trash to your hand. If you bet, add up to 2 SIGNI that shares a color with your LRIG from your trash to your hand instead.

card.name: Invest Charging
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
[Bet]: 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. If you bet, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone instead.

card.name: Nurari, Phantom Apparition Princess
card.text:
(Layer): All Apparition SIGNI on your field get the following [Layer] ability:
[Layer] [Constant]: This SIGNI is unaffected by the effects of your opponent's ARTS and SPELLs with total cost 5 or more.
[Life Burst]: Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Odanobu, Great Demon of Pride

[Constant]: While this SIGNI is on your center SIGNI Zone, this SIGNI gets [Triple Crush]. [Enter]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power lower than or equal to this SIGNI's power.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or lower. - Search your deck for 1 Valor SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: ≡Garnet Star≡, Natural Star Princess
card.text:
[Auto]: Each time this SIGNI crushes a card in your opponent's Life Cloth, you may pay {1}. If you do, search your deck for 1 card and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. [Enter]: If your opponent has more cards in their Life Cloth than you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's center SIGNI Zone.
[Life Burst]: Your opponent puts 1 SIGNI from their field into the trash unless they either discard 2 cards from their hand or put 2 cards from their Ener Zone into the trash.

card.name: Ark of Fighting Spirit
card.text: This SPELL costs {R}{R} less to use if there is a SIGNI with 15000 power or higher on your field. Choose up to two: - Search your deck for 1 Valor SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. - If there is a SIGNI with (Rise) on your field, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Honeytra, Super Trap
card.type: SIGNI|LB - War Spirit: Trick - Aya Limited
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, flip 1 Trap on the same SIGNI Zone as this SIGNI face-up, then trigger its [Trap] ability if any. (Put the Trap into the trash after it resolves its [Trap] effect if any.) [Enter]: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may set 1 of them on 1 of your SIGNI Zones as a Trap, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Life Burst]: Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. If there is a Trap on your field, down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

(Traps are set on SIGNI Zones facedown. A SIGNI Zone may only have 1 Trap on it at a time. When a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks towards a SIGNI Zone with a Trap, if there is no SIGNI on that SIGNI Zone, you may flip the Trap face-up and trigger its [Trap] ability if any. Then put the flipped card into the trash.)
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Nezukozo, Small Trap
card.text: [Action] {Down}: Add 1 Trap from your field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Keshiotoshi, Small Trap
card.text:
[Trap]: Banish all SIGNI on your opponent's field with 2000 power or lower.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: FUNNY
card.text:
Draw 1 card. Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.
[Trap]: If it is currently your opponent's turn, draw 1 card and your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

card.name: BAD SIDE
card.text:
Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 non-colorless SIGNI from it, and discard it.
[Trap]: Banish 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field on top of its owner's deck.

card.name: #Catch-Up#, Word of Following Wisdom
card.text: [Constant] (Wisdom = 8): The [Life Burst] abilities of cards that this SIGNI crushes from Life Cloth don't trigger. (This ability is active while the total combined levels of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is exactly 8.) [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may increase or decrease the level of 1 Wisdom SIGNI on your field by 1 until end of turn. Levels cannot become 0 or lower by this effect.

card.name: #Root#, Square of Root Wisdom
card.text: [Auto]: When the SIGNI in front of this SIGNI is banished, up this SIGNI if it wasn't attacking. [Action] {Down}: 1 SIGNI on your field gets +5000 power until end of turn.

card.name: #Crane-Turtle#, Word of Foot Wisdom
card.text:
[Enter] (Wisdom = 3): Search your deck for 1 level 1 Wisdom SIGNI and put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. (This ability is active while the total combined levels of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is exactly 3.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: #Work#, Word of Working Wisdom
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may increase the level of this SIGNI by 1 or 2 until end of turn.

card.name: #Planting-Trees#, Word of Tree Wisdom
card.text:
[Enter] (Wisdom = 1): Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Wisdom SIGNI, add it to your hand. (This ability is active while the total combined levels of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is exactly 1.)
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Code Eat Cheesetar
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Cooking - Mel Limited
card.text: [Enter]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put 1 SIGNI with (Accessory) from among them into your Ener Zone, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Code Eat Muffin
card.text: [Constant]: All accessorized SIGNI on your field get +2000 power.

card.name: Code Eat Masyru
card.text:
(Accessory) (This card may be attached to SIGNI on your field as an [Accessory].)
[Action] {0}: Attach this card from your Ener Zone to 1 SIGNI on your field as an [Accessory]. (Attaching an Accessory to a SIGNI is done by placing the Accessory under that SIGNI. A SIGNI can only have 1 Accessory attached at a time. When a SIGNI with an Accessory attached leaves the field, put its [Charm] into the trash.) [Constant]: The Cooking SIGNI accessorized with this card gets "When this SIGNI is banished, draw 1 card."
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Resurrection
card.text:
Add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Watermold, Natural Bacteria
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, 1 infected SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -8000 power until end of turn. (SIGNI that are on the same SIGNI Zone as a [Virus] are infected.)

card.name: Sootmold, Natural Bacteria
card.text: [Enter] Remove 1 [Virus] from your opponent's field: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.

card.name: Cottonmold, Natural Bacteria
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, 1 infected SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -5000 power until end of turn. (SIGNI that are on the same SIGNI Zone as a [Virus] are infected.)

card.name: Coronav, Natural Bacteria
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI banishes an infected SIGNI, draw 1 card. (SIGNI that are on the same SIGNI Zone as a [Virus] are infected.)

card.name: Spidermold, Natural Bacteria
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, 1 infected SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -2000 power until end of turn. (SIGNI that are on the same SIGNI Zone as a [Virus] are infected.)

card.name: Destruct Through (WX16)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
Your LRIG gets these abilities until end of turn: "[Action] {Exceed 1}: Draw 1 card. [Action] {Exceed 1}: Freeze 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Action] {Exceed 2}: Declare 1 card name. Then look at your opponent's hand and discard all cards with the declared name."

card.name: Destruct Out (WX16)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
Your LRIG gets "When this LRIG attacks, if you did not use any ARTS other than "Destruct Out" this turn, you may put any number of cards from under this LRIG into the LRIG Trash. Each player puts the top 5 cards of their deck into the trash for card put into the LRIG Trash this way. Then if you have 0 cards in your deck, up this LRIG." until end of turn.

card.text: [Coin] 3 (You get 3 Coins as this LRIG is put onto your field.)

card.name: Star Festival
card.text: Choose one: - Banish 1 non-RESONA SIGNI on your field. If you do, search your deck for 1 Space SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. - Banish 1 RESONA on your field. If you do, return 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Flathro Captain, Roaring Flame
card.text: [Enter]: Declare 1 number from 0 to 5, then put that many cards from the top of your deck into the trash. If all of the cards that were put into the trash this way are Weapon SIGNI, banish 1 SIGNI with the same level as the declared number.

card.name: Heike, Phantom Insect

card.name: Mikamune, Small Sword

card.text: [Constant]: While there is a non-white SIGNI on your field, this SIGNI's power becomes 5000. [Constant]: While this SIGNI is in your Ener Zone, when you would pay 1 ener that shares a color with your LRIG, you may put this SIGNI from your Ener Zone into the trash instead.

card.name: Urban, Roaring Gun

card.name: SPADE WORK
card.text: Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, search your deck for 1 non-colorless card with [Life Burst], reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
[Encore] {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you use this ARTS. If you do, this ARTS gets "Return this ARTS to your LRIG Deck.") 1 SIGNI on your field gets +3000 power and gets "During your opponent's turn, this SIGNI is unaffected by your opponent's card effects." until end of turn.

1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack." until end of turn. Then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Pluralism Depiction (WX16)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]:
[Chain] {G}{W} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {G}{W} less to use.) Choose one: - Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn. - If your Life Cloth was crushed by your opponent's card effect this turn, add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. - Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI and put it onto your field. That SIGNI's [Enter] ability is not triggered. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Michael, Voice of Reconciliation (WX16)
card.text: [Action] {Down}, Discard 1 card from your hand: Search your deck for 1 level 3 or lower white SIGNI, reveal it, then put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.text: [Action] {Down}, Discard 1 card from your hand: Search your deck for 1 level 2 or lower white SIGNI, reveal it, then put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

[Life Burst]: Add 1 SIGNI with [Guard] from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Furious Gambling

If the card has neither the declared icon nor the declared card type, put all SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. If the card has either the same declared color or same declared card type, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. If the card has both the declared color and the declared card type, discard all cards in your hand.

card.name: Resonance March
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Put up to 2 RESONA from your LRIG Deck onto your field, ignoring their (Play Condition). The [Enter] abilities of RESONA put onto your field this way don't trigger. At the end of the turn, return those RESONA to the LRIG Deck.

card.name: Neptune, White Natural Star
card.type: RESONA - Nature Spirit: Space - Sashe Limited

[Enter]: Search your deck for 1 level 1 SIGNI and put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. [Enter]: During your opponent's next Main Phase, the limit of your opponent's LRIG is reduced by 1.

card.name: Grave Rush
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
While you have 2 or less cards in your Life Cloth, this ARTS also gets Use Timing [Attack Phase].
If there are 0 SIGNI on your field, put 3 SIGNI from your trash onto your field. They all lose their abilities. At the end of the turn, put those SIGNI from the field into the trash.

card.name: Carnival -Q-
card.text: [Constant]: "Carnival -Q-" is unaffected by other cards' effects. [Auto]: When this LRIG attacks, choose one: - Draw 1 card. - Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. - This LRIG gets [Double Crush] until end of turn. - Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. [Action] ((Joker)) [Attack Phase] Pay 1 Coin: 1 SIGNI on your field becomes a copy of 1 SIGNI in your trash until end of turn.

card.name: Allos Piruluk N
card.text: [Coin] 3 (You get 3 Coins as this LRIG is put onto your field.) [Constant]: This LRIG can only grow into an LRIG with "Allos" in its name. [Enter]: Draw 2 cards. [Action] [1/Turn] Discard 2 cards from your hand: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] Discard 3 Misfortune Insect SIGNI from your hand: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Action] ((Peeping)) Pay 2 Coins: Look at your opponent's hand. Declare 1 number, then your opponent discards all non-colorless SIGNI with the same level as the declared number.

card.name: Nameless Fear
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Choose two. If you bet, choose four instead. You may choose the same effect multiple times: - Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. Discard 1 card from your hand. - Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn. - Search your deck for 2 Apparition SIGNI with different levels, reveal them, then add them to your hand. The shuffle your deck.

card.name: Falling Splendor, Flowing Essence
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose one. If you have a Ril or Mel LRIG, choose up to two instead: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or higher. - 1 SIGNI on your field gets [Double Crush] until end of turn. If that SIGNI is level 4 or higher, it also gets [Assassin] until end of turn. - Add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. Discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: One Touch, Armor's End
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 Coin as you use this ARTS.) 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field becomes "Servant ZERO" until end of turn. If you bet, all SIGNI on your opponent's field become "Servant ZERO" until end of turn instead. ("Servant ZERO" is a level 1 colorless Origin Spirit SIGNI with 1000 power and no other abilities.)

card.name: Evacuation Advice

Use Timing [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 Coin as you use this ARTS.) Put 1 SIGNI on your field into the trash. If you do, when a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks this turn, if it is the first or second attack this turn, disable that attack. If you bet, if your opponent's LRIG attacks this turn, disable that attack.

card.name: Dona THIRD+

card.name: Dona SECOND+

1 player shuffles all cards from their trash into their deck.

[Constant]: This SIGNI gets +1000 power for each card under it. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, put any number of SIGNI under it into trash. Then put any number of SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash whose total combined level is equal to the total level of the SIGNI put into the trash this way. Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with the same level as the Space SIGNI revealed this way (if any), then put all the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in a random order."

card.name: Victory Song of Connected Destruction
card.text: Choose up to three: - If your opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw 1 card. - If your opponent has more cards in their Ener Zone than you, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. - If your opponent has more cards in their Life Cloth than you, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Timerbomb, Super Trap
card.type: SIGNI|LB - War Spirit: Trick - Aya Limited
card.text:
[Action] {Down]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may set 1 of them on 1 of your SIGNI Zones as a Trap, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Trap]: You may pay {3}{U}{U}. If you do, return all SIGNI on your opponent's field to their owners' hands.
[Life Burst]: Return 1 Trap on your field to its owner's hand. If you do, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

card.name: §Sakurae§, Phantom Insect
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand into the trash, you may pay {U}. If you do, put this SIGNI from your trash onto the field. [Enter]: When this SIGNI is put onto your field from the trash, look at your opponent's hand.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

card.name: §Shirae§, Phantom Insect
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand into the trash, you may pay {U}. If you do, put this SIGNI from your trash onto the field.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: ARROW RAIN
card.text:
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Set any number of them on your SIGNI Zones as a Trap, then put the rest into the trash. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {1}{U}: Exclude this card in your trash from the game. If you do, flip 1 Trap on your field face-up then activate its [Trap] effect if any. (Put that card into the trash afterwards.)
[Trap]: If you have 2 or less cards in your Life Cloth, you may pay {U}. If you do, 1 attacking SIGNI does not damage you with its attack.
[Life Burst]: Choose one: - Draw 1 card. - Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

card.name: FLASH
card.text: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand. [Auto]: When this card is put from your hand into the trash, down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: #Bisection#, Half-Cut of Dividing Wisdom
card.type: SIGNI - Image Spirit: Wisdom - Mama Limited
card.text: [Enter] (Wisdom = 3): Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your Ener Zone onto your field. [Auto] (Wisdom = 7): When this SIGNI banishes a SIGNI, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with the same power as that banished SIGNI. [Auto] (Wisdom = 11): When this SIGNI attacks, banish all other SIGNI with the same power as this SIGNI. (Abilities with (Wisdom) are only active while the total combined level of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is equal to the specified (Wisdom) number.)

card.name: #Congruence#, Twins of Equal Wisdom
card.text:
[Enter] [Wisdom = 2]: Put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone. [Enter] [Wisdom = 3]: Draw 1 card. (Abilities with (Wisdom) are only active while the total combined level of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is equal to the specified (Wisdom) number.)
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: Code Eat Baguette
card.type: SIGNI - Machine Spirit: Cooking - Mel Limited
card.text: [Constant]: During your opponent's turn, when a Cooking SIGNI on your field would be banished, you may put an Accessory attached to that SIGNI into the trash instead.

card.name: Spore, Natural Bacteria
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Nature Spirit: Bacteria - Nanashi Limited
card.text:
[Enter]: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -2000 power until end of turn. [Action] Remove 2 [Virus]es from your opponent's field: Put this SIGNI from your trash onto the field.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 [Virus] on 1 of your opponent's SIGNI Zones. Then 1 infected SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -5000 power until end of turn.

card.name: Kobold, Phantom Apparition
card.text:
[Enter]: Shuffle up to 4 Apparition SIGNI from your trash into your deck.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 Apparition SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Dwarf, Phantom Apparition
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Living Spirit: Apparition - Dona Limited
card.text:
(Layer) All Apparition SIGNI on your field get the following [Layer] ability:
[Layer] [Action] {W}, Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with the same level as this SIGNI to its owner's hand.
[Life Burst]: Return 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI from your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Troll, Phantom Apparition
card.text:
(Layer): All Apparition SIGNI on your field get the following [Layer] ability:
[Layer] [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished during your opponent's turn, you may add this SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand.

card.name: Ishtaro, Vengeful Bull Raiser
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, this SIGNI gets +3000 power for each SIGNI with (Rise) on your field until end of turn. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, if there are 2 SIGNI with (Rise) on your field, banish 1 SIGNI in front of this SIGNI.

card.name: Gugalanne, Heavenly Bull Wrapped in Flames
card.text: [Auto]: When a SIGNI with (Rise) is put onto your field on top of this SIGNI, all SIGNI on your field get +2000 power until end of turn.

card.name: Humbaba, Hybrid Monster
card.text:
(Rise) 1 level 2 or lower red SIGNI.
[Auto]: When this SIGNI leaves the field during your opponent's turn, you may put 1 SIGNI without (Rise) that was under this SIGNI from your trash onto your field. The [Enter] abilities of that SIGNI do not trigger.

card.name: ≡Albedo≡, Natural Star
card.text:
[Enter] Discard 1 Space SIGNI from your hand: Search your deck for 1 SIGNI with the same level as the SIGNI discarded this way, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: ≡Ecliptic≡, Natural Star
card.text: [Constant]: While this SIGNI is in your deck, hand, or trash, when 1 of your card effects refers to this SIGNI's level, this SIGNI's level can be treated as any level from 1 to 4. (This SIGNI's actual level is not changed through this effect.)

card.name: ≡Equinox≡, Natural Star
card.text: [Constant]: While this SIGNI is in your deck, hand, or trash, when 1 of your card effects refers to this SIGNI's level, this SIGNI's level can be treated as any level from 1 to 3. (This SIGNI's actual level is not changed through this effect.)

card.name: Claymore, Medium Trap
card.text: [Action] [Attack Phase] Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: You may change the SIGNI Zones of any Traps on your field, then draw 1 card.

card.name: Plasbomb, Medium Trap
card.text:
[Enter] {0}: Shuffle up to 3 SIGNI with [Trap] other than "Plasbomb, Medium Trap" from your trash into your deck.
[Trap]: Your opponent shuffles all cards in their trash into their deck. Then if 10 or more cards were shuffled into their deck this way, you may pay {U}. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Mine, Small Trap
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, you may pay {U}. If you do, search your deck for 1 level 2 Trick SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: §Takaashi§, Phantom Insect
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand into the trash, freeze up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field. (Frozen SIGNI do not up during their user's next up phase.)
[Life Burst]: Down and freeze up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: §Yakouchi§, Phantom Insect
card.text: [Enter]: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand. [Action] {Down}: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: §Yunohana§, Phantom Insect
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand into the trash, if there are 3 or less cards in your hand and a Misfortune Insect SIGNI is on your field, draw 1 card.
