card.name: §Umihota§, Phantom Insect
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand. [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: §Shiomaneki§, Phantom Insect
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand into the trash, look at your opponent's hand.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1]

card.name: §Yago§, Phantom Insect
card.text: [Enter]: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: FAKE DOLL
card.text:
Put 1 Origin Spirit SIGNI on your opponent's field on top of its owner's deck.
[Trap]: Choose one: - Add 1 colorless card from your trash to your hand. - Look at your opponent's hand, choose a colorless card from there, then discard it.
[Life Burst]: Choose 1. - Add 1 colorless card from your trash to your hand. - Look at your opponent's hand, choose a colorless card from there, then discard it.

card.name: #Venndia#, Set of Circular Wisdom
card.text: [Enter] (Wisdom = 7): This SIGNI gets "This SIGNI cannot be banished." until end of turn. (Abilities with (Wisdom) are only active while the total combined level of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is equal to the specified (Wisdom) number.)

card.name: #Rounding#, Disposal of Ending Wisdom
card.text: [Constant] [Wisdom = 5]: All SIGNI on your field get +3000 power. [Constant] [Wisdom = 8]: All SIGNI on your field get +5000 power. (Abilities with (Wisdom) are only active while the total combined level of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is equal to the specified (Wisdom) number.)

card.name: #Line#, Line of Opportune Wisdom
card.text: [Constant] [Wisdom = 8]: This SIGNI gets [Assassin]. (An attacking SIGNI with [Assassin] deals damage to the opponent without battling the SIGNI in front of it.) (Abilities with (Wisdom) are only active while the total combined level of all Wisdom SIGNI on your field is equal to the specified (Wisdom) number.)

card.name: Code Eat Tartar
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Cooking - Mel Limited
card.text:
(Accessory) (This SIGNI may be attached to SIGNI on your field as an [Accessory].)
[Auto]: When a level 2 or lower SIGNI is put onto the field in front of this SIGNI, you may banish that SIGNI. [Action] {G}: Attach this card from your Ener Zone to 1 SIGNI on your field as an [Accessory]. [Auto]: When this card accessorizes a level 3 or higher Cooking SIGNI, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.

card.name: Code Eat Salsauce

If you do, either put the top 3 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone or draw 3 cards."

[Action] {Down} Discard 1 Dragon Beast SIGNI from your hand: Search your deck for 1 Dragon Beast SIGNI other than "Apato, Phantom Dragon" and put it onto the field. Then shuffle your deck.

card.text:
[Enter]: Add 1 blue SPELL with total cost 4 or more from your trash to your hand.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 SPELL, reveal it, then add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Superb Performance
card.text: Choose one: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, search your deck for 1 Playground Equipment SIGNI and put it into your Ener Zone. Then shuffle your deck. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, add 1 Playground Equipment SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand.

card.name: Charm Tactics
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Encore] {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you use this ARTS. If you do, this ARTS gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Choose one: - Attach the top 2 cards of your deck to up to 2 SIGNI on your field as [Charm]s. - Attach the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck to up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field as [Charm]s.

card.name: Don't Move (WX17)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Down up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Chain Blue and Black (WX17)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Chain] {U}{B} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {U}{B} less to use.) Choose up to two: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -3000 power until end of turn. - Add 1 non-colorless SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Look at your opponent's hand and the top card of your opponent's deck. - Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Blue Punish (WX17)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
Choose up to two. If you have a Piruluk LRIG, choose up to three instead: - Cancel the effect of 1 SPELL with total cost 5 or less being used. - Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. - Draw 1 card.

card.name: Lock You (WX17)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
Your opponent's SPELLs cost {3} more to use until end of turn. If there is a Piruluk LRIG on your field, your opponent's ARTS costs {3} more to use until end of turn.

card.name: PRECIOUS (WX17)
card.text: Draw 5 cards, then discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: PICK UP (WX17)
card.text: You and your opponent discard all cards from your hands, then draw cards equal to the highest number of cards discarded from a player's hand this way.

card.name: CRYSTAL SEAL (WX17)
card.text: Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random.

card.name: Kakusen, Natural Stone (WX17)
card.text: [Constant]: While your LRIG is red and this SIGNI is on your center SIGNI Zone, this SIGNI gets [Double Crush].

card.name: Code Art †ALCA†

card.name: Three Burning Gathered Steps (WX17)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Banish exactly 3 SIGNI with the same power as each other.

card.name: Urith, Enma of Scattering Petals
card.text: [Enter]: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add any number of Devil SIGNI from among them to your hand, then put the rest into the trash. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Search your deck for 1 Devil SIGNI and put it onto your field, put 1 Devil SIGNI from your trash onto your field, then shuffle your deck. [Action] [Attack Phase] Pay 1 Coin: Discard 1 Devil SIGNI from your hand. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Guzuko, Useless Princess of Pitiful Sin
card.text: [Auto] [1/Turn]: When a Playground Equipment SIGNI on your field is banished during your opponent's Attack Phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Playground Equipment SIGNI, you may put it onto the field. [Enter]: Search your deck for 1 Playground Equipment SIGNI and put it onto your field. Then shuffle your deck. [Action] ((Direct)) [1/Turn] Pay 2 Coins: When your opponent is damaged this turn, crush 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.

card.name: Gold Defense
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 Coin as you use this ARTS.) Choose one. If you bet, choose up to two instead: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack." until end of turn. - Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn.

card.name: Don't Act
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 3 Coins. (You may pay 3 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field, then draw 1 card. If you bet, down 3 SIGNI on your opponent's field, then draw 3 cards instead.

card.name: Firm and Solid
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS.) Choose up to two. If you bet, choose up to three instead: - Banish all SIGNI with 15000 power or higher. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or higher. - Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone. - Add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth.

card.name: ≡Golden Sun≡, Red Natural Star
card.type: RESONA - Nature Spirit: Space - Carnival Limited
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Main Phase]: Put 3 non-RESONA Space SIGNI from your hand and/or field into the trash.
[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, put the top 3 cards of your deck into the trash. If the total combined levels of all SIGNI put into the trash this was was 7 or higher, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. If it was 10 or higher, this SIGNI gets [Assassin] until end of turn. If it was 12 or more, this SIGNI gets [Triple Crush] until end of turn.

card.text: [Enter]: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into the trash. If 3 Devil SIGNI were put into the trash this way, draw 1 card.

card.name: †Arcfraud†, Revolutionary Banner of Love
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -7000 power until end of turn. If there is a SIGNI with "Arcgain" in its card name on your field, up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field get -7000 power until end of turn instead.

card.name: Drei=Aconitine

If there is a SIGNI with "Rikabuto" in its card name on your field, they get −3000 power instead. [Enter]: If there is a card with "Rikabuto" in its card name in your trash, search your deck for 1 "Violence Splash", shuffle your deck, then either use it without paying its cost or put it into the trash.

card.name: Enza, Natural Bacteria
card.text: [Enter]: Choose one. If there is a card with "Influ" in its card name in your trash, choose up to two instead: - Remove 1 [Virus] from your opponent's field. If you do, either put the top card of your deck into the Ener Zone or draw 1 card. - Put 1 [Virus] on 1 of your opponent's SIGNI Zones. - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -5000 power until end of turn if it is infected.

card.name: Code Anti Sothoth
card.text: [Action] [Attack Phase] [1/Turn] {0}: Put 4 black SIGNI with different levels in your trash on the bottom of your deck in a random order. If you do, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -7000 power until end of turn. Use this ability only if there is a card with "Yog-Sothoth" in its card name in your trash. [Action] [Attack Phase] {B}{B}: Put this SIGNI from your trash onto your field. Use this ability only if there is a card with "Yog-Sothoth" in its card name on your field.

card.name: Code Anti Dagon
card.text: [Enter]: When this SIGNI is put onto your field from the trash, draw 1 card.

card.name: Tarantula, Phantom Insect
card.text: [Constant]: All RESONAs on your field cannot be banished by your opponent's card effects. card.name: Karehachou, Phantom Insect
card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand or deck into the trash, you may choose 1 card from your opponent's trash, then attach it to 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field as a [Charm].

Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose one: - Add up to 2 Poison Fang SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Discard all cards in your hand, then put up to 2 Poison Fang SIGNI from your trash onto the field.

card.name: Succeed Destruct
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Your LRIG gets these abilities until end of turn: "[Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 4}: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field." "[Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 4}: Draw 2 cards." "[Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 4}: Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone."

card.name: Vier=Rikabuto (WX20)

[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, all SIGNI on your opponent's field get -1000 power for each Poison Fang SIGNI on your field until end of turn. [Auto]: When a SIGNI is put from your opponent's field into the trash during your turn, put the top card of your deck into your Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: 1 SIGNI on the field gets -10000 power until end of turn. If you have a Poison Fang SIGNI on your field, 1 SIGNI on the field gets −7000 power until end of turn. (You may choose the same SIGNI twice.)

card.name: Code Anti Yog-Sothoth (WX20)

card.text:
(Cross): "Shub-Niggura, Fertility of Chaos" Left
[Auto]: When a card is put from your trash into your deck by a card's effect, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −2000 power until end of turn. [Cross Auto]: When this SIGNI reaches [Heaven], all SIGNI on your opponent's field get −10000 power until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 white or black SIGNI from your trash onto the field or add it to your hand.

card.name: Violence Splash (WX20)
card.text:
If a SIGNI with 0 power or lower would be banished this turn, put it into the trash instead of the Ener Zone. If an opponent's SIGNI's power would decrease by your SIGNI's ability this turn, its power decreases by twice that amount instead.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 SIGNI from your trash onto your field or add that SIGNI to your hand.

card.name: Class Crisis (alt)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
As you use this ARTS, you may discard 1 Machine Spirit SIGNI from your hand. If you do, this ARTS costs {W}{W} less to use. Choose up to two: - Search your deck for 1 Machine Spirit SIGNI and put it onto your field. The [Enter] abilities of that SIGNI do not trigger. Then shuffle your deck. - If it is your opponent's turn, your opponent's LRIG loses all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: One Mind, Roaring Body (alt)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
As you use this ARTS, you may discard up to 2 War Spirit SIGNI from your hand. This ARTS costs {1}{R} less to use for each SIGNI discarded this way. Banish up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Lace Tornado (alt)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
If there is a Living Spirit SIGNI on your field, this ARTS costs {U} less to use.
If you have less cards in your hand than your opponent does, draw 3 cards. Then if either player has 6 or more cards in their hand, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field on top of its owner's deck.

card.name: Mutual Prosperity (alt)

card.name: Dark Cognate (alt)

Choose up to two: - Banish 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field. - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −12000 power until end of turn. - Put 1 Image Spirit SIGNI from your trash onto your field. Its [Enter] abilities do not trigger.

card.name: Get Brilliant (WX20)

card.text: If a player has 5 or more cards in their Ener Zone, that player puts cards from their Ener Zone into their trash until they have 4 cards in their Ener Zone.

card.name: Gun Smoke Flame Aura (WX20)
card.text: Banish 1 SIGNI on your field. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI with 10000 power or lower.

[Trap]: You may put 1 other Trap on your field into the trash and pay {U}. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

You may choose the same SIGNI multiple times.

Use this ability only if this SIGNI is in your trash.

card.text: [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, if there is another Angel SIGNI with a different color from this SIGNI on your field, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power lower than or equal to this SIGNI's power.

[Constant]: While there is a "Tawil, Who Reaches Out" on your field, this LRIG's limit is increased by 1, and this LRIG also becomes white and gets Tawil in addition to its other LRIG types. card.name: Grave Digger
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: Any number of Coins. (You may pay any number of Coins as you use this ARTS.) Choose one for each Coin you bet. You may choose the same option multiple times. - This ARTS costs {B}{B}{B} less to use. - Repeat the following effect of this ARTS once.
Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field and add 1 Playground Equipment SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose up to two: - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets -8000 power until end of turn. - Add up to 2 level 2 or lower black SIGNI from your trash to your hand. - Each player puts a number of cards from the top of their deck into the trash equal to their LRIG's level multiplied by 3. - If you have 25 or more cards in your trash, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Nekomatar, Phantom Apparition Princess

[Constant]: Neither player can use SPELLs with total cost 0. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may exclude 1 SPELL with total cost 0 in either player's trash from the game and pay {1}. If you do, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

If this SIGNI is in [Drive], banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower instead.

Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a card with the declared name. Add it to your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in a random order. Then if 7 or more cards were revealed this way, discard 1 card from your hand.

[Action] [1/Turn] Put the bottom 4 cards of your deck into the trash, {U}: If the total combined level of the SIGNI put into your trash to use this ability is 11 or higher, banish 1 frozen SIGNI on your opponent's field, then if you have a Remember LRIG, banish 1 more frozen SIGNI on your opponent's field.

[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may return this SIGNI from your field to its owner's hand. If you do, put 1 level 4 SIGNI from your hand onto your field, except "GF House". That SIGNI's [Enter] abilities don't trigger.

card.name: GF First Morning
card.text:

card.name: GF Compact

[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card, then if you have 4 or less cards in your Life Cloth, [Ener Charge 1].

card.name: Next Future
card.text:
You get an additional Attack Phase after this turn's next Attack Phase. At the beginning of this additional Attack Phase, up all SIGNI on your field.

If 3 or more were sent, choose up to 2 instead: - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. - Draw 2 cards.

[Action] [1/Turn] {0}: Choose up to 2 players. Each chosen player shuffles all cards in their hand into their owners' decks, then draws a number of cards equal to the number of cards they put into the deck this way. Players may only draw up to 5 cards with this effect.
[Life Burst]: Draw 1 card, then your opponent puts 1 card from their hand on the top of its owner's deck.

Banish 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field. Then you may put 1 KEY from your field into the LRIG Trash. If you do, put 1 SIGNI from your trash onto the field. That SIGNI's [Enter] abilities do not trigger.

card.name: Code VL Alice Mononobe

card.text:

card.name: Code VL Elu

Add up to 4 SIGNI with different levels from among them to your hand, then put the rest into the trash.

Your [Life Burst] do not trigger for the rest of this game.

card.name: The Twister
card.text: [Constant]: LRIG type is ignored while growing into this LRIG. [Auto]: At the beginning of your Main Phase, put 1 card from under a LRIG into the LRIG Trash, or put 1 card from a player's SIGNI Zone, Ener Zone, or Life Cloth into the trash. [Enter]: Declare 1 card name of a non-colorless SIGNI. During this game, the levels of all SIGNI with the declared name in your main deck, hand, and field become 0, and you may ignore its limiting conditions when putting that SIGNI onto your field.

card.name: Holy Grand Slam
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
If you have a Tama LRIG, this ARTS costs {U}{U} less to use. Use 1 ARTS with total cost 5 or less from any player's LRIG Trash, ignoring its limiting conditions and without paying its costs.

card.name: Circuitous Corridor
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
If you have a Piruluk LRIG, this ARTS costs {G}{G} less to use. Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the Ener Zone. Then, if your opponent's LRIG is white, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. If it is red, put 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth into the Ener Zone. If it is blue, your opponent discards 3 cards from their hand. If it is green, draw 3 cards, then put up to 3 SIGNI from your trash into the Ener Zone. If it is black, put 1 SIGNI from your trash onto your field. If it is colorless, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Story Teller
card.text:

card.name: Arc Cross Counter (WXK09)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
As an additional cost to use this ARTS, put 4 cards from under your LRIG into the LRIG Trash. Down your opponent's LRIG and all of their SIGNI.

card.name: Remodeling Parts
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
You cannot use "Remodeling Parts" for the rest of this turn. Choose one: - 1 Electric Machine SIGNI on your field gets +4000 power until end of turn. - You may pay {G}. If you do, 1 Electric Machine SIGNI on your field gets "[Action] {Down}: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with power lower than this SIGNI's power." until end of turn. - You may pay {G}{G}. If you do, 1 Electric Machine SIGNI on your field gets "[Auto] [1/Turn]: When this SIGNI attacks, up this SIGNI." until end of turn.

card.name: Arcgain, Azure Angel of Fighting Together (alt)
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Angel - Tama Limited (KS)
card.text:
[Constant]: While there are 1 or less cards in your opponent's hand, Angel SIGNI on your field are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's SIGNI. [Auto]: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if there are 15 or more Angel SIGNI in your trash, draw 1 card. [Enter] Discard 1 Angel SIGNI from your hand: Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.
[Life Burst]: Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field, then add 1 Angel SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Code Heart VⱯC (alt)
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Machine Spirit: Electric Machine - Piruluk Limited (KS)
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, if there are 2 or more Electric Machine SIGNI of each level from 1 to 4 in your Ener Zone, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the Ener Zone. If there are 3 or more of each, put all SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash instead. [Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your trash into the Ener Zone, you may add this SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 Electric Machine SIGNI from your trash to your hand or put it onto the field.

card.name: Seyuragi, Evil Sin of Fluctuation (alt)
card.type: SIGNI|LB - Image Spirit: Beautiful Technique - Alfou Limited (KS)
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, put the top 3 cards of any player's deck into the trash. 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −1000 power for every 3 cards in all players' trashes until end of turn. [Enter]: Put 1 SIGNI from your opponent's trash onto your field puppeteered.
[Life Burst]: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −12000 power until end of turn.

card.name: Sunflower Fire
card.manacost: W/R W/R W/R W/R W/R W/R
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn. Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field whose level is equal to that LRIG's level to its owner's hand, then banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field whose level is lower than that LRIG's level.

card.name: Mendako Guillotine
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
Choose up to two: - Your opponent cannot use SPELLs this turn. - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field loses its abilities until end of turn. - Exclude up to 3 SIGNI in your opponent's trash from the game. - Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash, then discard 2 cards from your hand. - Put the top 2 cards of your deck into the trash, then add up to 2 white and/or black SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Burning Wind, Watery Moon
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Choose up to two: - Your opponent discards 1 card from their hand. - Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - If your opponent has 2 or more SIGNI on their field than you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower. - If your opponent has 2 or more cards in their Life Cloth than you do, crush 1 card in your opponent's Life Cloth.

card.name: Protection Mapping
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
Draw X cards or [Ener Charge X], where X is equal to your LRIG's level, then add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth. Cards in your non-field zones cannot be moved to another zone by your opponent's card effects until the end of the next turn.

card.name: Purple Stem, Green Leaf
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
The next time you would be damaged this turn, you are not damaged instead. If the power of a SIGNI on your opponent's field would increase by a card effect, its power decreases by the same amount instead. Choose 1 SIGNI Zone. SIGNI in the chosen SIGNI Zone get +10000 power during this turn.

card.name: World End, Key of the Song of Kalpa's End
card.text: [Auto]: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if there are 2 or more non-Origin Spirit classes among SIGNI on your field, draw 1 card or [Ener Charge 1]. [Action] Pay 1 Coin: Shuffle 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into its owner's deck. [Action] [Attack Phase] Put this KEY from the field into the LRIG Trash and put 1 non-CRAFT ARTS from your LRIG Deck into the LRIG Trash: Put 1 SIGNI from your trash onto the field.

card.name: Eraser Smash
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
[Encore]: Pay 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS. If you do, this card gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Choose one: - If it is currently your opponent's turn, your opponent's LRIG loses its abilities and cannot get new abilities until end of turn. - You may pay {W}. If you do, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets "This SIGNI cannot attack." until end of turn.

card.name: Blazing with Rage
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
[Encore]: Pay 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS. If you do, this card gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Choose one: - If it is currently your opponent's turn, all cards in your opponent's Ener Zone lose their colors and abilities until end of turn. - You may pay {R}. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 7000 power or lower.

card.name: Fortune Imagine
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose one. If you have a Remember LRIG, choose up to two instead: - Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field, then freeze all SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Put the bottom card of your deck into the trash. If that card is a SIGNI, put it onto the field. - Put the bottom card of your deck into the trash. If that card is a SIGNI, down all SIGNI on your opponent's field whose level is equal to that SIGNI's level.

card.name: Don't Call
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
[Encore]: Pay 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS. If you do, this card gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Choose one: - Your opponent cannot draw cards or add cards to their hand by their card effects until end of turn. - You may pay {U}. If you do, down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Shot Shower
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase]
Choose up to two. If you have a Midoriko LRIG, choose up to three instead: - Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the Ener Zone. - Put up to 2 SIGNI from your Ener Zone onto the field. All SIGNI on your field get +5000 power until end of turn. - SIGNI on your opponent's center SIGNI Zone cannot attack during your opponent's next turn.

card.name: Stop Flight
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
[Encore]: Pay 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS. If you do, this card gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Choose one: - Your opponent's LRIG and SIGNI cannot up this turn. - You may pay {G}. If you do, if your opponent's LRIG attacks this turn, disable that attack.

card.name: Criminal Retouch
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
[Encore]: Pay 2 Coins. (You may pay 2 Coins as you use this ARTS. If you do, this card gets "Return this card to the LRIG Deck.") Choose one: - If it is currently your opponent's turn, your opponent can't newly put SIGNI onto the field by their own card effects until end of turn. - You may pay {B}. If you do, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −7000 power until end of turn.

card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Your LRIG gets the following abilities until end of turn: "[Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field loses its abilities until end of turn. [Action] [2/Turn] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 1}: Add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Down 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field."

card.name: Lulu Suzuhara, Supporter
card.text: If you have a Nijisanji LRIG, this KEY's cost becomes {0}. [Constant]: If you would pay {R} or {U} for an ener cost, you may pay {W} instead. [Action] [Attack Phase] Put this KEY from the field into the LRIG Trash: Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand.

[Action] [Attack Phase] Put this KEY from the field into the LRIG Trash: Up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field lose their abilities until end of turn.

card.text: [Enter]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, then return them to the top of your deck in any order. [Action] [1/Turn] {0}: Declare 1 number, then reveal the top card of your deck. If you put 7 SIGNI that share a single common class with each other into your deck this way, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash."

If you chose two or more, this ARTS costs {1}{W}{W} more to use for each effect chosen beyond the first: - Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. - Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. Discard 2 cards from your hand. - Search your deck for up to 2 white SIGNI, reveal them, then add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Giant Killing (WXK10)

Choose two: - Your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand. - Down and freeze your opponent's LRIG. - Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field on top of their deck. Discard 1 card from your hand. - Cancel the effect of 1 SPELL being used. If you do, [Ener Charge 4].

card.name: Code Accel Fitru (WXK10)
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI enters [Drive], you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 7000 power or lower. If this SIGNI is in [Drive], banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower instead.
[Life Burst]: Choose 1: - Draw 1 card. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 10000 power or lower.

card.name: Princess Defense

Use Timing [Attack Phase]
If your opponent used an ARTS or SPELL this turn, skip your opponent's LRIG Attack Step this turn. You may exclude 1 ARTS with total cost 2 or more in your LRIG Deck from the game. If you do, skip your opponent's SIGNI Attack Step this turn.

card.name: Lock Your Heart

This ARTS cannot be used unless it is currently your opponent's turn. Choose one: = ARTSs your opponent uses cost {3} more to use until end of turn. Return this ARTS to your LRIG Deck. = Your opponent cannot attack with SIGNI whose levels are lower than their LRIG's level until end of turn.

If there are 25 or more cards in your trash, choose up to two instead: = Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your trash onto your field. = All SIGNI on your opponent's field get -2000 power multiplied by the level of your opponent's LRIG until end of turn.

"[Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Your opponent's LRIG and 1 SIGNI on their field gets "This card cannot attack." until end of turn. Your opponent adds up to 1 SIGNI from their trash to their hand. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Return up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field to their owners' hands. Your opponent adds 1 card of their choice from their trash to their Life Cloth."

If you do, add the top card of your deck to your Life Cloth.

card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose up to four: = Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 12000 power or lower. = Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your trash onto your field. = Add 1 SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand. = Each player puts the top 7 cards from their deck into the trash.

card.name: Meiji, Alice, and Era, Supporters
card.text: If you have a Nijisanji LRIG, this KEY's cost becomes 0 coins. [Constant]: You cannot be damaged by your opponent's LRIG if it is level 2 or lower. [Auto]: When your LRIG grows, [Ener Charge 1]. [Action] Put this KEY from the field into your LRIG Trash: Return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. Add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand. Search your deck for 1 SIGNI and put it onto your field. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Ultum VS Liwat, Balance of Causality
card.text:
[Constant]: Your LRIG gets the following ability:
"[Auto] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Put all SIGNI on your field into the trash, then put a number of SIGNI from your trash onto your field up to the number of SIGNI put into the trash this way."
[Constant]: All LRIGs' limits are reduced by 1.

card.name: Ril VS Carnival, Memory of Conflict
card.text: [Constant]: Players pay {0} to grow into a non-colorless LRIG during the grow phase (instead of paying regular grow costs). [Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] Pay 1 Coin: Put 1 SIGNI from your hand onto your field. Its [Enter] abilities don't trigger, and it becomes "Servant ZERO" until end of turn. [Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] Pay 1 Coin: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Damage yourself.

card.name: Piruluk VS Remember, Recurring Thoughts
card.text:
[Constant]: Your LRIG gets the following ability:
"[Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Down up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field. Discard 3 cards from your hand."
[Auto]: When a SIGNI on the field is downed, freeze it.

card.name: Alfou VS Haity, Profusing Bouquet
card.text: [Constant]: Players can only have up to 2 cards in their Life Cloth crushed per turn. [Enter]: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into the trash, then add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] Put this KEY into the LRIG Trash: You may use 1 ARTS in your opponent's LRIG Trash as if as it were used from your LRIG Deck. If you do, treat its colored ener costs as if they were colorless. When that ARTS leaves the Check Zone, exclude it from the game.

card.name: Rikabuto, Natural Plant Princess
card.text:
[Auto] [1/Turn]: When a SIGNI leaves your opponent's field by a card effect during your turn, [Ener Charge 1]. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may discard 1 card from your hand. If you do, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field whose level is less than or equal to the number of cards on your SIGNI Zones into the trash.
[Life Burst]: Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Code VL Kana Sukoya
card.text:
[Auto] [1/Turn]: When a SIGNI on your field whose level is lower than this SIGNI's level is banished, you may put that SIGNI from the Ener Zone onto your field. [Auto] [1/Turn]: After this SIGNI attacks, if that attack did not damage your opponent, up 1 SIGNI on your field whose level is lower than this SIGNI's level. [Enter] {1}{W}: Put 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your trash onto your field.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 level 3 SIGNI from your trash to your hand or put it onto your field.

card.name: Diabride, Natural Celebration Stone
card.text:
[Constant]: While this SIGNI is on your center SIGNI Zone, it gets "[Auto] [1/Turn]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may pay {3}. If you do, up this SIGNI." [Auto] [1/Turn]: When a SIGNI on your field becomes affected by your opponent's ARTS, up that SIGNI and it loses all abilities it got from other card effects until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Return 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand. If there are 2 or less cards in your Life Cloth, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash instead.

card.name: Code Anti Hellboros
card.text:
[Constant]: Cards in your opponent's Ener Zone lose [Multi Ener] and are unaffected by your opponent's card effects. [Auto] [1/Turn]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field is banished, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field whose power is lower than that SIGNI's power. [Action] [1/Turn] {R}: Put 1 level 3 or lower red SIGNI from your trash onto your field.
[Life Burst]: Add 2 SIGNI that share a color with each other from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Arcgain, Pioneer of Flame Demons
card.text:
[Constant]: SIGNI on your field are unaffected by your opponent's SIGNI effects except for [Life Burst] effects during your turn. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, if there are 3 or more different levels among SIGNI on the field, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Enter] {1}{R}: Search your deck for 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI and put it onto your field. Shuffle your deck.
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field.

card.name: Code Labyrinthe Queen
card.text:
[Auto] [1/Turn]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may change the SIGNI Zones of any number of SIGNI on your field. [Auto]: When this SIGNI battles a SIGNI on your opponent's field, put that SIGNI on the bottom of its owner's deck. Draw 1 card.
[Life Burst]: Search your deck for 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI, reveal it, then add it to your hand or put it onto your field. Shuffle your deck.

card.name: Munkarun, Azure Angel of the Holy Tomb
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI leaves the field by your opponent's card effect, discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, look at your opponent's hand, then choose and discard 1 card from it.
[Life Burst]: Add 2 SIGNI with the same level from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Osagitsune, Phantom Apparition Princess
card.text:
[Auto] [1/Turn]: When you use a green ARTS or green SPELL, [Ener Charge 1] or add 1 SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may shuffle all cards from your trash into your deck. If you added 15 or more cards to your deck this way, put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the Ener Zone.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 2]

card.name: Daihouika, Green Water Phantom Princess
card.text:
[Auto]: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, [Ener Charge 1]. [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, this SIGNI gets [Lancer] until end of turn. [Auto]: At the end of your turn, put 1 card from your Ener Zone into the trash.
[Life Burst]: [Ener Charge 1], then add up to 1 SIGNI from your Ener Zone to your hand.

card.name: Contempora, Mysterious Superboast

[Auto]: When this SIGNI is put from your hand or deck into the trash by a card effect during your turn, you may put this SIGNI from your trash onto your field.
[Life Burst]: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into the trash, then add 1 card of your opponent's choice from your trash to your Life Cloth.

card.name: Sayuragi, Lesser Sin of Dancing

card.name: Beigoma, Benevolent Play
card.text: [Auto] [1/Turn]: When this SIGNI attacks, return up to 2 other SIGNI on your field to their owners' hands, then reveal cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of SIGNI returned to your hand this way. Add 1 white SIGNI from among them to your hand or put it onto your field downed, then return the rest to the top of your deck in any order.

Then flip 1 Trap on your field face up and trigger its [Trap] ability if any. - Draw 2 cards. Then, set 1 card from your hand on 1 of your SIGNI Zones as a [Trap].

card.text:

card.name: Countless Bullet

card.name: Third Destiny

You may put any number of non-colorless SIGNI from among them onto your field, then put the rest into the trash. The [Enter] abilities of those SIGNI do not trigger. - Exclude up to 3 cards in your opponent's trash from the game. - Shuffle 3 cards from your trash into your deck, then draw 1 card.

card.type: SIGNI - Living Spirit: Sky Beast / Living Spirit: Earth Beast

You may pay an additional {W} as you use this ARTS.
Choose one. If you paid the additional {W}, choose two instead: - Put 1 Apparition SIGNI from your hand onto your field. - All Apparition SIGNI with (Layer) on your field get "[Layer] [Auto]: When this SIGNI leaves the field, return 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field to its owner's hand."

card.name: Cthulhu Abyss (SP37)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. Your opponent's LRIG gets "This LRIG cannot attack." until end of turn. Put 1 SIGNI from your trash onto the field. That SIGNI's [Enter] abilities do not trigger.

card.name: Anti Ability (SP37)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
This ARTS cannot be used unless it is during your opponent's turn. This turn, the triggered abilities of SIGNI in all of your opponent's zones other than [Life Burst] do not trigger. ("When", "whenever", "at", [Enter], [Auto], [Trap], and [Life Burst] abilities are triggered abilities.)

card.name: Ice Flame Shoot (SP37)
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
Choose up to four. This ARTS costs {2} more to use for each option chosen beyond the second: - Down 1 of your opponent's LRIGs. - Freeze 1 of your opponent's LRIGs. - Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field with 7000 power or lower. - Banish 1 non-RESONA SIGNI on your opponent's field. Discard 1 card from your hand.

card.name: Sea and Sky Becoming One Blue (SP37)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
[Chain] {G}{U} (The next ARTS you use this turn costs {G}{U} less to use.) Choose up to two: - Down up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Add up to 2 cards from your Ener Zone to your hand. - Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone. - Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Dark Cognate (SP37)

Choose up to two: - Banish 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI on your opponent's field. - 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −12000 power until end of turn. - Put 1 Image Spirit SIGNI from your trash onto your field. Its [Enter] abilities do not trigger.

card.name: Try Luck (PR459A)
card.text:
Use Timing [Main Phase] [Attack Phase]
Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking, and your opponent reveals it. Then apply the following effect based on what card it is: - Level 1 SIGNI: Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone. - Level 2 SIGNI: Draw 3 cards. - Level 3 SIGNI: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - Level 4 SIGNI: Put 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. - Level 5 SIGNI: Discard 1 card from your hand. - SPELL: Your opponent discards the revealed card.

card.name: Tamayorihime, Miko of Nature's Beauty

card.text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose any number of Angel SIGNI that do not share a color between them from among them. Put any number of the chosen cards into your Ener Zone, add any number of them to your hand, then put the rest into the trash.

card.name: Counter Vamp
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase]
[Bet]: 1 Coin. (You may pay 1 Coin as you use this ARTS.) Choose one. If you bet, choose up to three instead: - If a SIGNI left your field by your opponent's card effect this turn, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. - If a card was put from your Ener Zone into the trash by your opponent's card effect this turn, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your Ener Zone. - If you discarded a card from your hand by your opponent's card effect this turn, if you have 5 or less cards in your hand, draw cards until there are 6 cards in your hand.

[Action] [1/Turn] {0}: Use 1 SPELL with total cost 5 or less from your hand without paying its costs. Use this ability only if there is a "Tamayorihime, Modern Miko" on your field.

card.name: Tama's Flame
card.text:
Use Timing [Attack Phase] [Spell Cut-In]
This ARTS costs {1}{R} less to use if your opponent used a SPELL this turn. This ARTS costs {3}{R}{R}{R} less to use if your opponent used an ARTS this turn. You cannot lose the game this turn. Exclude this card from the game.

card.name: Great Tamayori-oh, Five-Body Combination
card.text:
(Grow) You cannot grow into this LRIG unless you exclude 5 Tama LRIGs in your LRIG Deck from the game.
[Constant]: You may grow into this card from a level 0 LRIG. [Constant]: You cannot use ARTs or SPELLs. [Action] [Main Phase] [Attack Phase] {W}{W}{W}, Exclude 1 Tama LRIG in your LRIG Deck from the game: Choose one. You cannot choose an option that was already chosen this game: - Put all SIGNI on your opponent's field into the trash. - Put all cards in your opponent's deck into the trash. - Reveal 1 card in your opponent's LRIG Deck at random. If it is not a LRIG card, put it into the LRIG Trash.

card.name: Tama, Escape from Reality
card.text:
(Play Condition) [Main Phase] Put any number of SIGNI whose total combined power is 10000 or higher from your Ener Zone into the trash.
[Auto]: When you shuffle your deck, this SIGNI gets +5000 power until end of turn. [Auto]: At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if this SIGNI's power is 10000 or higher, draw 1 card. If its power is 25000 or higher, return this SIGNI to the LRIG Deck, then put 1 "Hibiki Sakura, Evolving Muscle" from your LRIG Deck onto your field.

card.name: Hibiki Sakura, Evolving Muscle
card.text: [Constant]: This SIGNI cannot be newly put onto the field except by the ability of "Tama, Escape from Reality". [Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, put all cards from your opponent's Ener Zone into the trash. [Enter]: Put all SIGNI from your opponent's field into the trash.

card.name: Theory That All Opposing LRIGs Admire Tama

During this game, LRIGs on all fields get Bukubu Tama LRIG type in addition to their other types. Choose up to one for each LRIG type your opponent's LRIG has: - Your opponent's LRIG cannot damage you during your opponent's next turn. - Your opponent cannot use non-colorless ARTS and SPELLs during their next turn. - Search your deck for up to 2 colorless SIGNI, reveal them, then add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

[Action] [1/Turn] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 2}: Put the top 9 cards of your deck into the trash. If 9 cards were put into the trash this way, up to 2 SIGNI on your opponent's field get a total of -18000 power until end of turn, given in increments of -1000." [Action] Put this KEY from your field into the LRIG Trash: Add up to 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: Nemesis, Great Attire
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI is banished, you may pay {B}. If you do, banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field. [Action] {B}, Put this SIGNI from your field into the trash: 1 SIGNI on your field gets +3000 power and "[Auto]: When this SIGNI attacks, 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field loses power equal to this SIGNI's power until end of turn."
[Life Burst]: Banish 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field that attacked this turn.

card.name: The Spinning Key
card.text:
[Constant]: Your LRIG gets the following abilities:
"[Action] {Exceed 1}: Your opponent's LRIG cannot damage you during the next turn. [Action] [Attack Phase] {Exceed 3}: Your LRIG gets "[Auto]: When a SIGNI on your opponent's field attacks, you may discard 1 SIGNI who has the same level as that SIGNI from your hand. If you do, that attack does not damage you." until end of turn.

card.name: Airi, Netherworld of Flame Demons
card.text:
[Auto]: When this SIGNI crushes a card in your opponent's Life Cloth, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 level 2 or lower SIGNI from among them to your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in a random order. [Enter]: Your opponent chooses a card in your hand at random, then you reveal it. If the revealed card is a Devil SIGNI or a level 3 or lower SIGNI, this SIGNI gets [Lancer] until end of turn.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 Devil SIGNI or 1 level 3 or lower SIGNI from your trash to your hand.

card.name: The Law, Crossbow Book (PR-K080)
card.text:
(Rise) 2 SIGNI (This SIGNI cannot be put onto your field unless you put 2 SIGNI on your field onto the same SIGNI Zone either one of them was on then putting this SIGNI on top of them.)
[Action] [Attack Phase] Put 1 card from under this SIGNI into the trash: 1 SIGNI on your opponent's field gets −4000 power until end of turn. [Action] [1/Turn] {1}: Add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand.
[Life Burst]: Add 1 SIGNI from your trash to your hand.
